title: Latvian Foreign Minister on U.S. visit, sees Stallone and KISS get gongs
summary_full: From 8th to 9th December, Latvia's Minister of Foreign Affairs, Baiba Braže, is on a working visit to Washington D.C, in the United States.
summary_public: From 8th to 9th December, Latvia's Minister of Foreign Affairs, Baiba Braže, is on a working visit to Washington D.C, in the United States.
